english: Chinese cabbage;napa cabbage;white cabbage;general term for cabbages

etymology.description: 白 ‘white’ + 菜 ‘vegetable’ = white/pale-stalked cabbage; general term for cabbages.
etymology.interpretation: Names the pale-stalked cabbage common in North China, often referring to napa/Chinese cabbage. In broader or casual use, can serve as a generic for cabbages.

examples.chinese: 我买了一棵白菜(我買了一棵白菜)。
examples.english: I bought a head of Chinese cabbage.

examples.chinese: 冬天吃炖白菜最暖和(冬天吃燉白菜最暖和)。
examples.pinyin: Dōngtiān chī dùn báicài zuì nuǎnhuo.
examples.english: Eating stewed cabbage in winter is the warmest.

examples.chinese: 这里的白菜很便宜(這裡的白菜很便宜)。
examples.english: The cabbage here is very cheap.
